1.content:
Kim groaned as she got up from her bed and stumbled into her bathroom. She turned on the faucet and splashed some cold water on her face and feeling more awake she looked up at her reflection and gasped. Her once tone and slim stomach was now slightly pudgy. She poked at it and her finger sunk in about a hair's worth, but still enough to make Kim panic.

Kim sat on the toilet her head in her hands, she had one week of no heroics and nothing else to do but school and some cheer-leading and she managed to pack on a few pounds. As she tried to decide what to do next a couple of options rose immediately to the center of her mind.

111.content:
Kim was glad it was Saturday as that meant that she could use the exercise equipment in the gym without anyone seeing her. So after a light breakfast she jogged to the school and around to the gym. Using her keys to the gym by her right as cheer captain she slipped inside and made her way to the locker room to change into a pair of shorts and a sports bra.

Kim then warmed up on the treadmill and moved onto several of the various pieces of exercise equipment that was either bought when there was enough in the budget or donated to the school. After about forty-five minutes of exercise she cooled down by doing some stretches and returned to the girls locker room to shower.

Kim had just turned off the shower when the sound of the door opening made Kim flaten herself against the wall of the shower cubicle. Slowly peaking around the corner Kim was suprised to see who had shown up to school on a Saturday.

Don't you deserve that Kim, someone to stand by your side and let you be you and if the you happens to like being big well that's a nice bonus don't you think." However, if you want to go back to being the perfect by society's ever changing standards then I won't stop you. She was always rushing off to save the world from some disaster or another and Global Justice and the governments sat back and let her do all the work that they should have been doing in the first place. They heaped praise upon her and patted her on the head and then sat back when the next disaster came and watched her do it all again.

When she had returned him to his village he had hugged her and Kim was praised by everyone in the village. Soon more images came to her, the jungle from up close as she moved from tree to tree, people in need of help looking at her with teary eyes as she selflessly assisted them with no thanks needed. It was the people that she was doing this for and the pleasure she received was just the bonus.

Kim straightened her shoulders and stood tall and proud before calmly striding from the gym unaware of a pair of eyes watching her in disbelief as she simply left without a backwards glance. Bonnie's fingernails clawed down the doorway as she glared daggers at Kim's back. No one rejected Bonnie, especially not a wayward little pig that thought to highly of itself. Oh Bonnie would make sure that Kim paid for this insult one way or another Bonnie would find Kim and get her back.

Of course Bonnie was now confronted with an issue that needed to be addressed. Kim was a survivor and very tough, it would take a lot to catch her unaware and then capture her. She was half tempted to wait it out and let time lower Kim's guard, but Kim's insult fueled Bonnie's rage beyond her control and Bonnie had to do something to control her anger.

12.content:
"Have a nice day," Monique waved the last rush customer out and sighed in pleasure that things were finally peaceful. A timid tapping drew Monique's attention to the front where Kim was nervously shuffling her feet. "Kim, sweetie what's wrong?" Monique marched around the counter and up to Kim who stared at the floor her face bright red. Monique paused and then shut and locked the doors and put up a sign that said out to lunch.

"Thanks Monique," Kim was still addressing the floor, but the red was fading from her face.

"No problem girlfriend, now tell me what's wrong," Monique said as she wrapped an arm around Kim's waist and dragged her to the employee break room. Once Kim was seated Monique got out the lunch that her mother had packed for her and groaned. At Kim's questioning looks Monique sighed, "My mother seems to think that I need some more weight on my bones and always packs my lunch with heavy foods. I mean sure I enjoy the occasional Beuno Nacho, but still I worked hard for this figure and I want to keep it. It's my mother though and I just can't refuse her." Monique shrugged and got up and removed a large salad and sandwich from the fridge.

As Monique sat down again Kim finally spoke up, "actually that is what I wanted to talk to you about."

"My lunch?" Monique stared at Kim is surprise.

"No you see its..." Kim sighed and stood up and pulled up her purple shirt and Monique saw that Kim's once washboard stomach had a little jelly on it.

14.content:
It was a beautiful Sunday and Kim could always exercise later, however her stomach decided to remind her that it was breakfast time and giving her tank top a tug Kim headed downstairs where her mother was starting to prepare breakfast. "Morning Mom," Kim pecked her mother on the cheek before pouring herself a big glass of milk.

"Morning Kimmie, how did you sleep last night?" Dr. Possible turned towards her daughter and caught the sight of Kim's now tone-less stomach and a peculiar rush passed through her body. Kim however didn't seem to notice as she stretched in her seat.

"Great Mom and I am really hungry for some reason,"

"Well you are a growing girl," her mother smiled at her before turning back to the stove and spoke in a low tone, " in more ways than one."

"You say something Mom?"

Dr. Possible blinked for a second before she registered what Kim had asked. "Oh, yes your father got called in today and the boys are over at their friends for the last day of their weekend sleepover so it's just you and me." Another rushed passed through Anne Possible as she finished an omelet and slid it onto a plate and then handed it to Kim.

"Thanks Mom," Kim tucked into her breakfast as her mother stared at her stomach.

'Maybe I should make pancakes as well,' her mother thought before turning back to the stove. 'How much harm could a little food do after all especially compared to the dangerous things that Kim did every day.'

Kim loved her work, the danger, the excitement, it all called to Kim and she jumped into every situation she could get into. However, it was stressful having so much pressure on her and she wasn't certain if rushing to help the world every day was a suitable long term plan.

151.content:
A familiar beeping made Kim jump out of bed and sink into her computer chair just as Wade's face appeared on the screen. "Hey Wade what's up?"

"Hey Kim it looks like Shego is using the special hours at a local jewelry store to take advantage of their one hundred percent off special. You want me to get Ron?"

"No big Wade, it’s just Shego all I'll need is a ride."

"Okay Kim ride in five, good luck."

"Thanks Wade you rock."

"You know it," Wade said before the computer shut off. Kim threw on some mission clothes and in five a taxi pulled up outside.

"Hey Jack," Kim greeted the taxi man as she slid into the backseat of the cab.

"Hey Kim, long time no see," Jack grinned at her in the review mirror. "Thanks again for saving my butt that time in New York by the way."

"It was no big, just your usual out of control taxi, with an unconscious driver, on the mean streets of New York." Jack grinned again and gunned the engine and in minutes they were outside the jewelry store.

“Good luck Kim,” Jack waved as he drove off.

Kim waved and then marched into the store, “excuse me miss is there anything I can help you with, directions to jail maybe.” Kim said as she sunk into a fighting stance while Shego turned around and smirked at her.

“Is that really the best you can come up with Princess,” Shego also dropped into a fighting stance and her eyes scanned Kim and froze for a second on her stomach. Then Shego sprang forward and jabbed at Kim several times which Kim easily dodged and when she pressed her own attack she felt Shego’s leg trip her up and she tumbled into a doorway marked ‘employee break room’. Landing awkwardly in a chair Kim straightened up only to be confronted with Shego holding a donut in front of her.

Kim’s stomach choose that moment to growl and blushing Kim accepted the donut with a muttered thanks. As she chewed on the confection she noticed that Shego was eying her stomach hungrily and licking her lips. “Uh, Shego what’s up?”

“I have decided on a better way to spend our time than fighting. “ She smirked at Kim’s raised eyebrow, “you’re going to become my fat, helpless pet.”

“What!”

“Says the girl who is licking her fingers,” Kim forced herself to drop her fingers and glared at Shego. “Listen Pet you have two choices we can do this the easy way and you’ll get whatever you could need or the hard way I give you the bare essentials and stuff you until you burst every day. Your call Pet and to show how nice I am I’ll give you some time to decided but don’t take too long.” Shego then leaned forward and kissed Kim roughly and thoroughly.

As Kim watched Shego return the jewelry she knew that Shego was serious and more than likely she would be taken in her sleep if she didn’t respond quickly enough. Shego in a way though offering Kim the chance she was looking for to escape the pressure of society, however the cost was very steep and permanent. Once again Kim stood on the edge of a monumental decision. Freedom from a stressful life full of constant demands and interruptions or a life where she was free within a certain set of parameters and yet still had all she could want.

info.brief_description: Kim has packed on some pounds and several people are liking the change.
info.description:
Okay, the story goes that Kim had a slow heroing week and managed to pack on a couple of extra pounds. Several people have noticed this and are really liking it.

Rules:
1)Let your mind run rampant
2) However what you add must match the story line in some way.
3) Please write at least a paragraph, even a short one, no one liners.
3a) The exception to the rules is if your opening the way for several choices to be made.
4) I reserve the right to delete a chapter that I find is completly tearing apart the fabric of the story or is too offensive even for me, or too short.

Anyway I hope you all enjoy this story.
